posts.post_content:
When someone pays 5+ life for a spell, this card was worth the mana invested. At worst, you lose 4 life and counter a spell.  
  
This card does not work competitively, but can be really effective in some casual play.

posts.post_content:
A flavorful attempt of a red counter control.  
It might be enjoyable regarding gameplay, but overall it's awful nontheless.  
  
Unless you're casting this spell after having taken control of an opponent's turn with [Mindslaver](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mindslaver) or [Sorin Markov](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sorin Markov), this virtually reads: "*Far worse than a timeshifted red [Cancel](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Cancel). You lose 1 life.*"
posts.html:
A flavorful attempt of a red counter control.
It might be enjoyable regarding gameplay, but overall it's awful nontheless.

Unless you're casting this spell after having taken control of an opponent's turn with Mindslaver or Sorin Markov, this virtually reads: "Far worse than a timeshifted red Cancel. You lose 1 life."
